articles.author: ADRIANA GOMEZ LICON, JESSE BEDAYN
articles.title: Trump drives his anti-immigration message in Aurora, Colorado - The Associated Press
articles.description: Donald Trump spent time Friday in a Colorado suburb away from battleground states. He's pushing a message, often using false or misleading claims and dehumanizing language, that migrants are causing chaos in smaller American cities and towns. And he's doublin…
articles.content: AURORA, Colo. (AP) Donald Trump detoured from the battleground states Friday to visit a Colorado suburb thats been in the news over illegal immigration as he drives a message, often using false or mi… [+7511 chars]
